Disposition of Veterans Pension Amounts Under 38 CFR 3.1001 and 38 CFR 3.1007
38 CFR 3.1001
provides for the disposition of Veterans Pension amounts in Old-Law Pension cases, withheld by reason of the hospitalization of a competent Veteran, as an accrued lump sum upon the Veteran’s death.
38 CFR 3.1007
prohibits paying such withheld amounts as accrued in cases of incompetent Veterans.
